WindowGetSelection.summary: The getSelection() method of the interface returns the object associated with the window's , representing the range of text selected by the user or the current position of the caret.
WindowGetSelection.returns: A object, or null if the associated document has no browsing context (for example, the window is an iframe that is not attached to a document).When called on an iframe that is not displayed (e.g., where display: none is set) Firefox returns null, whereas other browsers returns a object with set to None.
